Canchánchara.Name: Canchánchara
Canchánchara.Prep: Mix rum and honey together in a glass until honey dissolves. Add remaining greds, fill glass with ice. Mix.

Penicillin.Name: Penicillin
Penicillin.Prep: Shake greds with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Float single malt peaty scotch.

Sazerac.Name: Sazerac
Sazerac.Prep: Chill a glass; empty and rinse with absinthe. Combine greds in a mixing glass, fill with ice, stir. Strain into absinthe glass. Twist a lemon peel over drink for oils, discard peel. Optionally discard ice cube.

Aviation.Name: Aviation
Aviation.Prep: Combine greds in shaker with ice. Strain into coupe. Garnish with cherry.

Last Word.Name: Last Word
Last Word.Prep: Combine greds in shaker with ice. Double strain into chilled coupe.

Yellow Daisy.Name: Yellow Daisy
Yellow Daisy.Prep: Combine greds in mixing glass with icx. Stir and strain into chilled coupe.

Rob Roy.Name: Rob Roy
Rob Roy.Prep: Combine greds in mixing glass with icx. Stir and strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

Rusty Nail.Name: Rusty Nail
Rusty Nail.Prep: Add ice to double old fashioned glass. Add drambiue and scotch. Garnish with citrus twist.

Blood and Sand.Name: Blood and Sand
Blood and Sand.Prep: Combine greds in shaker with ice. Strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with orange twist.

Bobby Burns.Name: Bobby Burns
Bobby Burns.Prep: Combine greds in mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

Gibson.Name: Gibson
Gibson.Prep: Combine greds in mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cocktail onion. See: https://www.seriouseats.com/lemon-scented-cocktail-onions-recipe, https://imbibemagazine.com/recipe/homemade-cocktail-onion-recipe/.

Bijou.Name: Bijou
Bijou.Prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain. Express and garnish with lemon.

Tailspin.Name: Tailspin
Tailspin.Prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain. Express and garnish with lemon.

Hanky-Panky.Name: Hanky-Panky
Hanky-Panky.Prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain. Express and garnish with orange.

Vieux Carré.Name: Vieux Carré
Vieux Carré.Prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain. Express and garnish with lemon.

Naked and Famous.Name: Naked and Famous
Naked and Famous.Prep: Shake with ice, strain into chilled coupe.

Lion's Tail.Name: Lion's Tail
Lion's Tail.Prep: Shake with ice, strain into chilled coupe. Express and garnish with orange. Can also add egg white.

Wildest Redhead.Name: Wildest Redhead
Wildest Redhead.Prep: Shake all greds except cherry heering with ice, strain into rocks glass with ice. Top with cherry heering. Honey syrup: 1 1/2 oz honey, 1/2 oz hot water; stir hot water into honey until dissolved, let cool.

Monte Cassino.Name: Monte Cassino
Monte Cassino.Prep: Shake with ice, strain into chilled coupe. Express and garnish with lemon.

Oh, My Word!.Name: Oh, My Word!
Oh, My Word!.Prep: Stir with ice, strain into chilled coupe. Express and garnish with lemon.

Sharpie Mustache.Name: Sharpie Mustache
Sharpie Mustache.Prep: Stir with ice, strain into chilled coupe. Express and garnish with orange.

Di Pompelmo.Name: Di Pompelmo
Di Pompelmo.Prep: Stir with ice, strain into chilled coupe. Express and garnish with grapefruit.

Boulevardier.Name: Boulevardier
Boulevardier.Prep: Stir into glass over ice. Express and garnish with orange or cherry.

Bonal & Rye.Name: Bonal & Rye
Bonal & Rye.Prep: Stir into glass over ice. Express and garnish with orange or cherry.

Petty Complaints.Name: Petty Complaints
Petty Complaints.Prep: Stir with ice, strain into chilled coupe.

Professor Snape Was a Single Mother.Name: Professor Snape Was a Single Mother
Professor Snape Was a Single Mother.Prep: Stir with ice, strain into chilled coupe. Shave nutmeg on top. Express and garnish with flamed lemon. Infuse sherry by roasting an acorn squash with brown sugar and oil, add sherry and wait 4-5 days.
Greds: 1 1/2 oz acorn squash fino sherry (tio pepe or lustau)

Bramble v2.Name: Bramble v2
Bramble v2.Prep: (This is the better bramble.) Add gin, lemon, simple and small amount of crushed to shaker. Whip shake, until ice is melted. Pour into old fashioned. Fill with crushed ice. Top with creme de mure. Garnish with blackberry and lemon slice.

El Capitán.Name: El Capitán
El Capitán.Prep: Add all ingredient to mixing glass with ice. Stir for 20 seconds. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Blackjack.Name: Blackjack
Blackjack.Prep: Stir with ice, strain into rocks glass with big ice. Add smoke. Tatarian website also lists smoked honey syrup, so maybe add some if you want it sweeter?

Amaretto Sour.Name: Amaretto Sour
Amaretto Sour.Prep: Add all greds to a blender. Blend until ice has melted. Pour into rocks glass with ice.
Greds: .5 oz egg white (egg white from half a large egg)
